abstract: William Kvist Jørgensen (born 24 February 1985) is a Danish footballer who plays as a midfielder for Fulham in the English Premier League (on loan from Bundesliga club VfB Stuttgart) as well as for the Danish national team.He played 43 matches and scored four goals for various national youth teams and is now an important player for the senior team.
